title: Fullstack Developer
description: My day-to-day is varied: I work across websites and web applications, adapting to each client's needs. Levitate values versatility and the ability to switch context quickly. As part of a small team, I wear many hats and learn on the fly. That environment has pushed me to pick up a broad range of technologies and frameworks and to grow as a developer.
key-responsibilities: Introduced Vite into the company's WordPress workflow, replacing legacy build tools with faster compilation, better hot reloading, and a more modern development experience.
Architect and maintain a shared global CSS system that unifies layouts and keeps design consistent across all client sites.
Collaborate with leadership to define technical approaches, assess feasibility, and recommend stacks that fit client requirements.
Act as the primary developer for Next.js and WordPress, bridging modern frameworks with traditional CMS builds.
Mentor developers and provide day-to-day support, promoting scalable, maintainable, and performant codebases.
key-achievements: Built a modular global stylesheet using CSS variables for design tokens (colors, radii, layout widths, etc.), enabling consistent design and reuse across client projects.
Cut front-end development time by 30-40% with a responsive, pre-optimized base framework that requires minimal custom work.
Improved delivery efficiency and client satisfaction through faster turnaround and consistently polished, adaptable layouts.
Modernized the internal WordPress build pipeline with Vite, significantly reducing build times and boosting developer productivity.
Maintain and update legacy WordPress sites so they stay secure, performant, and aligned with current best practices.
